description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

If you are interested in the Deluxe 3D Scroll Table from Hotwire Foam Factory (which is far better than the crafter version I have), I can't speak to it's quality or usefulness since I don't own one. However Mike from TerranScapes has an excellent review of it here: https://goo.gl/TZFLfL

BUY the PROXXON HOTWIRE TABLE
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

(USA) http://amzn.to/2lVNvEM 
(Canada) http://amzn.to/2pWazXF


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh


In this episode I put the Proxxon Thermocut and the Hotwire Foam Factory Scroll table head to head in a battle to see how they compare when performing basic foam cutting tasks. I discuss in detail the features and flaws in each to help you decide how best to spend your money when investing in a hotwire cutter for terrain building. 













Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Proxxon VS Hotwire Foam Factory: Product Showdown! (Black Magic Craft Episode 069)
